Text:
So people became sad when they saw "Tomb.Raider-SKIDROW" but was not Survival Edition...
So here you got it! The extra things you get in survival edition. Nothing important if u ask me but yea, some people may want this :P

Yes me i want it ^^
Many thanx for all your great UP Mr.Stifmeister :)

Stiffy, if you ask me you've missed the important bits:

"Guerilla Skin" in-game outfit

Three in-game weapons from "Hitman: Absolution" for use in "Tomb Raider": The Silverballer, Agency SPS 12, and HX AP-15

These exist but only in the steam ed. I've already got skids... how to get those things above?
every dlcs included? like the hitman's silverballer ?
